sentence1_my-bleu: Wittgenstein's point is that one cannot, in general, reduce statements at a higher level to a finitely specified set of necessary and suYcient statements at a lower level.

label: neutral
sentence1_en: မြေထဲပင်လယ်ရှိ အကောင်းဆုံးဆိပ်ကမ်းများမှာ ဇွန်လ၊ ဇူလိုင်၊ သြဂုတ်နှင့် မဲ၊ ၁၆ ရာစု Venetian ရေတပ်ဗိုလ်ချုပ် Andrea Doria က နွေရာသီရွက်လွှင့်ရာသီကိုကျော်လွန်ပြီး ရေတပ်သည် ဤနေရာတွင် အမိုးအကာထက် ကောင်းမွန်စွာလုပ်ဆောင်နိုင်မည်မဟုတ်ကြောင်း မှတ်ချက်ပြုပြောကြားခဲ့ပါသည်။

sentence1_my-bleu: Leading organizations decide, as part of a sourcing strategy, whether to provide specific information technology and management services with in-house staff or external providers.
sentence2_my-bleu: Organizations decide if they're going to use in-house employees of if it costs too much to do that.

sentence1_my-bleu: Finally, if the data you assessed are not sufficiently reliable, you should include this finding in the report and recommend that the audited entity take corrective action.
sentence2_my-bleu: Unreliable data should only be reported to law enforcement officials.

sentence1_my-bleu: when we do not have an adequate on-the-shelf set of designs and measures, an exploratory case study can save time and money in implementation as well as improving the confidence we have in our results.
sentence2_my-bleu: Having adequate on-the-shelf sets of designs and measures is preferable.

sentence2_en: အကယ်၍ သင်သည် အမေရိကန်အိန္ဒိယကလေးငယ်တစ်ဦးကို ပံ့ပိုးပေးမည်ဆိုပါက Future for Children တွင် သင်ပါဝင်နိုင်မည်ဖြစ်သည်။
sentence1_my-bleu: We invite you to participate in Futures for Children by sponsoring an American Indian child or by joining a Membership Circle to support our community education projects.

sentence1_my-bleu: More  The Anti-Defamation League's survey describes a continuing drop in America's hard core anti-Semites--from 29 percent in 1964, to 20 percent in 1992, to 12 percent currently.

sentence1_my-bleu: Keeping the integrationist faith are black liberals like Professors Henry Louis Gates and Cornel West. Joining them is black economist Glenn Loury, a conservative who broke ranks to endorse affirmative action as a necessary policy.
sentence2_my-bleu: Glenn Loury is not your typical conservative.
